ЁЯСС
Pinnacle of Gahadwala Power

Govindachandra was the most powerful ruler of the Gahadwala dynasty. His capital was Kannauj and his second capital was Varanasi. He conquered parts of Magadha from the Pala rulers and successfully repelled Ghaznavid invasions (Hammira).

ЁЯУЬ
Lakshmidhara and Kalpadruma

He was a learned ruler and was known as 'Vividha-Vidya-Vichara-Vachaspati'. His minister Lakshmidhara wrote the famous treatise 'Krityakalpataru' on law and procedure.
